simulatr: Generator for Reproducible Fake Data 

```{r setup}
library(simulatr)
```

Simulate some continuous data:

```{r}
x <- getSimluatedTwoArmMeans(n1 = 50, n2 = 50, mean1 = 5, mean2 = 7, sd1 = 3, sd2 = 4)
```

Print the results

```{r}
x
```

Plot the results

```{r}
plot(x)
```
